thread.title: LeBron, first lady Michelle Obama promote education
thread.title_full: LeBron, first lady Michelle Obama promote education

title: LeBron, first lady Michelle Obama promote education
text: > Sports LeBron, first lady Michelle Obama promote education First lady Michelle Obama greets people at The University of Akron, Wednesday, Oct. 21, 2015, in Akron, Ohio. Cleveland Cavaliers' LeBron James teamed up with Mrs. Obama to celebrate the importance of secondary education at a private event at the University of Akron. The NBA superstar, who went from high school to the pros, and first lady are hosting thousands of children and their parents at the school. (AP Photo/Tony Dejak)
